mobs.name: Green goo
mobs.desc: A translucent, jelly moving thing... yuck!

mobs.name: Possessed dwarf
mobs.desc: A dward, which has been possessed by the evil

mobs.name: Possessed armor
mobs.desc: An armor, which moves thanks black magic. Does it has a soul? Maybe not...

objects.name: Wooden hammer
objects.desc: A hammer made out of wood. It is a rather slow and innacurate weapon

objects.name: Iron hammer
objects.desc: A hammer made out of iron. It is a rather slow and innacurate weapon

objects.name: Magically reinforced Iron hammer
objects.desc: A hammer made out of iron. You can feel the magic flowing in it.

objects.name: Wooden sword
objects.desc: A sword made out of wood. It is an average weapon

objects.name: Iron sword
objects.desc: A sword made out of iron. It is an average weapon

objects.name: Magically reinforced Iron sword
objects.desc: A sword made out of iron. Magic flows into small metal veins on the skin of the blade, slightly glowing in the dark...
